title: Using Light and Self-Hypnosis to Achieve Goals
first_phrase: In the previous part of the text, the focus was on self-hypnosis to achieve our goals by deciding on the area of life we want to work on. Success/money, relationships, and health are macro-areas that we can choose from. Moving on to the last 200 tokens, the text explores the connection between the conscious state and brain waves. Our brain produces waves that correlate with our mental state- alpha, beta, gamma, delta, theta, and lambda waves. The predominance of a particular frequency is an indicator of a certain mental state. The text states that various schools of relaxation emphasize 'descending into alpha,' but it's only the first possible part of the process. The text also explores the use of light to help us achieve our goals and describes different phases of light transformation. The text mentions people who have managed to reach high levels of mental organization, self-awareness, and intuition, observed in meditators, through the use of gamma waves.

last_phrase: In conclusion, understanding the different brain waves and their corresponding mental states can aid in achieving a desired state of mind. While some relaxation techniques focus solely on alpha waves, other methods such as light therapy and developing personal magnetism can lead to deeper levels of consciousness, including the rare and powerful gamma and lambda waves.
